triples.name: Consensus dynamics
triples.relevance: The paper develops consensus tracking control protocols that apply consensus dynamics theory to multi-UAV systems.

triples.name: Unmanned aerial vehicle
triples.relevance: The paper focuses on control systems for UAVs which form the physical platform being controlled.

triples.name: Fault tolerance
triples.relevance: The paper develops fault-tolerant mechanisms to maintain proper system operation despite actuator failures in UAVs.

triples.name: Spacecraft attitude determination and control
triples.relevance: The paper applies attitude control techniques from aerospace to control the orientation of UAVs subject to constraints.

triples.name: Euler angles
triples.relevance: The paper addresses limitations of Euler angle representations in attitude control by developing universal barrier functions to replace restrictive Euler angle constraints.

triples.name: Barrier function
triples.relevance: The paper constructs a novel output-dependent universal barrier function to enforce attitude constraints without restricting Euler angles.

triples.name: Adaptive control
triples.relevance: The paper employs adaptive compensation mechanisms to adjust control parameters in response to actuator faults.

triples.name: Control theory
triples.relevance: The paper applies control theory principles to design consensus tracking control schemes with predefined-time convergence.

triples.name: Lyapunov stability
triples.relevance: The paper likely uses Lyapunov analysis to prove stability and convergence of the proposed control scheme.
